document.full_text: secretary of state hillary clinton urged tunisia on thursday to carry out economic and political reform as it emerges from authoritarian rule and praised the country for aiding refugees from fighting in libya.
document.title: clinton calls for reform in post-ben ali tunisia
lines_and_colors: secretary of state hillary clinton urged tunisia on thursday to carry out economic and political reform as it emerges from authoritarian rule and praised the country for aiding refugees from fighting in libya.
